solution_line_template: The second tree grows {first_tree_growth_rate}*{second_tree_time_factor} = <<{first_tree_growth_rate}*{second_tree_time_factor}={second_tree_growth_rate}>>{second_tree_growth_rate} meters a day.
The fourth tree grows {third_tree_growth_rate}+{fourth_tree_extra_growth} = <<{third_tree_growth_rate}+{fourth_tree_extra_growth}={fourth_tree_growth_rate}>>{fourth_tree_growth_rate} meters a day.
The first tree grows {total_days}*{first_tree_growth_rate} = <<{total_days}*{first_tree_growth_rate}={first_tree_total_growth}>>{first_tree_total_growth} meters in {total_days} days.
The second tree grows {second_tree_growth_rate}*{total_days} = <<{second_tree_growth_rate}*{total_days}={second_tree_total_growth}>>{second_tree_total_growth} meters in {total_days} days.
The third tree grows {third_tree_growth_rate}*{total_days} = <<{third_tree_growth_rate}*{total_days}={third_tree_total_growth}>>{third_tree_total_growth} meters in {total_days} days.
The fourth tree grows {fourth_tree_growth_rate}*{total_days} = <<{fourth_tree_growth_rate}*{total_days}={fourth_tree_total_growth}>>{fourth_tree_total_growth} meters in {total_days} days.

In {total_days} days, all four trees grew {first_tree_total_growth}+{second_tree_total_growth}+{third_tree_total_growth}+{fourth_tree_total_growth} = <<{first_tree_total_growth}+{second_tree_total_growth}+{third_tree_total_growth}+{fourth_tree_total_growth}={total_growth_all_trees}>>{total_growth_all_trees} meters combined.
